Add new platform.intro: Click on the edit button to start editing
Good Job! Now you can start editing. To add a new platform first click here on the platform button
Click anywhere on the map to specify the location for the new platform
Good job, you have successfully added a platform. Click escape to exit

Add new route.intro: Click on the edit button to start editing
Click on the browser heading to open it.
Click on the create route button.
Click here to start adding/removing members of the route.
Click on any marker on the map to add it to the new route.
Good job! You have successfully created a route with members.

Quick overview.intro: Try moving around in the map and zooming to download some new map data.
Good Job! Click keyboard key to move to the next step.
We have moved the map to a new location. Click on any of the stop which you see in center of the central park to start exploring it.
Here is the tag browser window. You can view all the tags of the selected stop/platform which you just selected here. Click keyboard key to move to the next step.
You can also view the parent routes of the selected stop/platform here. Try selecting a route from the given list.
Now you can see the information about of route you just selected.Click keyboard key to move to the next step.
The route which you selected is also highlighted on the map. Click keyboard key to move to the next step.
Click this button to go back to viewing information regarding your selected stop.
This way you can toggle between viewing information regarding the stop/platform selected or one of it's parent route. Click keyboard key to move to the next step.
Good Job!The tutorial is now complet. Click escape key to exit.
